attributes.action: give unmarried mothers the right to keep the child surname the same as her own if the father agrees and signs the birth certificate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has come about because my daughter can not change her surname on the day of my wedding because even though she has my surname, her father, who I have never been married too, refuses to sign the paperwork allowing the change because he has a parental responsibility order. Because of this my daughter will end up having neither biological parents surnames.

Originally after her birth the father agreed to allow her to keep my surname because we were not married and signed her birth certificate. But now many years later he will not allow my daughter's surname to stay the same as mine when I marry leaving her with my maiden name.

I am hoping that this petition will lead to a review of the law reguarding changes to a childs surname

Thankyou
